title: Hey everyone, I think I'll get CSE in PESU RR campus, is it worth joining?
content:
My main concerns are regarding the campus and college life, I've heard that the placements are good

I've also heard that once you get placed in a company, you're not allowed to sit in any other interviews, is this true?

My rank is 151, I can get CSE right?

comments.body: Ull get CSE for sure. And even I have the same Qs as you
higher tier means like a higher CTC right?
Hey, so are considering PESU CSE ?
College life is shit here. If you have other options go there.
